name: RadioReflect
description:
A 2D Action Platformer made for the 1-Bit Weekend Game Jam

READ: Use Of Themes Are:

  1. Radioactivity:  The Player Is In A Radioactive area of zombies!
  2. Reflections: Bullets Reflect Of Walls!
  3.  Dragons: Didn't Have Time To Implement :(

Some Answers to some Questions You Might Have:

  • Whats 1-Bit? Its Basically another way to say Two-Colors!
  • Who Made It? NilaCk, A Kid Who Likes Game Dev

Controls:

  • ASD or Arrow Keys To Move
  • W, Space, Up Arrow Keys for Jumping
  • There Is Triple Jumping
